article_title: Charlie Scott seeks another term in the Wyoming Senate
article_text:
Cheyenne, WY (82001)

Today

Cloudy skies. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 58F. Winds N at 15 to 25 mph..

Tonight

A few clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 39F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , news, local news, election, election 2016, election l, charlie scott, republican
article_metadata.author: Laura Hancock, Casper Star-Tribune

og.description: CASPER – Charlie Scott, Wyoming’s longest-serving state lawmaker, said he is seeking another term in the Senate.
